description: Community time-limited events with unique rewards

events.name: Launch Celebration
events.description: Celebrate the game launch! Complete quests to earn exclusive rewards.

events.name: Great Bug Hunt
events.description: Catch bugs around Cloverhollow! The more you catch, the better the reward.

events.name: Fishing Frenzy
events.description: Cast your line and reel in as many fish as you can!

events.name: Photo Contest
events.description: Take photos around town! Show off your photography skills.

notes: Timestamps are Unix timestamps (seconds since epoch)
Events auto-activate when current time is within start/end range
Players must explicitly join events to track progress
Rewards are claimed manually after reaching target
